title: Envy Watch Face
description: Envy is unique watch face styled as a mechanical analog watch. You can see all its internal structure and cogs mechanism. It is classical style watch and fits  everyone perfectly.Compatible withMoto360, Moto 360 2nd gen (42mm, 46mm), LG G Watch R (lgwr), LG G Watch W100 (lgwg), LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane (lgwu), Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 (sw3), Asus ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Huawei Watch, Tag Hauer Connected.If it uses android wear — this watch face will work on it.Pay attentionSometimes there may be a delay with getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, it is recommended to have a bit of patience if iyou are not in an urgent need of your watch.  This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.If the Application doesn't appear:- uninstall the face- restart phone- restart watch- connect watch and phone- install the watch faceIn case of any problems, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us ondigitalProdigee@gmail.com and we will help you to solve the issue.
descriptionHTML:
Envy is unique watch face styled as a mechanical analog watch. You can see all its internal structure and cogs mechanism. It is classical style watch and fits everyone perfectly.

Compatible with
Moto360, Moto 360 2nd gen (42mm, 46mm), LG G Watch R (lgwr), LG G Watch W100 (lgwg), LG G Watch, LG Watch Urbane (lgwu), Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 (sw3), Asus ZenWatch, Asus ZenWatch 2, Huawei Watch, Tag Hauer Connected.
If it uses android wear — this watch face will work on it.

Pay attention
Sometimes there may be a delay with getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, it is recommended to have a bit of patience if iyou are not in an urgent need of your watch. This is not caused by the watch face, but rather Android Wear app.

If the Application doesn't appear:
- uninstall the face
- restart phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone
- install the watch face

In case of any problems, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us ondigitalProdigee@gmail.com and we will help you to solve the issue.
comments: Looks nice Maybe in a future release add to functions to the top cogs?
